tool_description: Domain Availability API lets you check instantly if a domain name is available to be registered.
name: Domain Availability
title: Domain Availability

api_list.name: /api/v1
api_list.description: Domain Availability API helps you check whether a domain name is available for registration quickly and accurately.

required_parameters.name: domainname
required_parameters.description: the domain for which domain info is requested

optional_parameters.name: mode
optional_parameters.description:
The default mode is the fastest, the **DNS_AND_WHOIS** mode is slower but more accurate.
Acceptable values: **DNS_AND_WHOIS | DNS_ONLY**
Default: **DNS_ONLY**
